article: eu regulators on wednesday approved french mobile phone operator sfr to buy tele# ab 's french fixed-line telephone and broadband unit , after sfr and its parent vivendi promised to stay away from exclusive internet broadcast rights to blockbuster films and to offer content to rivals .
abstract: vivendi and sfr win eu go ahead for french tele# deal
